title: Aksjemordet
overview: Illegal money, hidden transactions and bribes are ingredients in this crime series in three parts from the stock market environment in Oslo. The year is 1986 and Jon Kaspersen is a journalist in Aftenbladet. One day, his father is imprisoned, suspected of murder - for pushing stockbroker Jeppe Rolfsen in front of a trailer outside Havnelageret in Oslo. Jeppe Rolfsen was involved in the acquisition of his father's workplace - a printing company - for the computer company Trovik. Is he guilty?
